name: Dipto Chaccroboti
details: The classes are very well structured, the explanations are made very simple to understand and the mentor is always looking for methodologies that are easy to understand, and as the class progresses, the level of difficulty is adjusting and creating the opportunity for learning.

name: Nafisa Nawal Mim
details: Great learning has Top mentors with tons of knowledge and most importantly, a lot of patience. I am looking forward to the upcoming mentor sessions.Thanks

name: Aion
details: Liked the pace, I have no programming experience, so it was appropriate pace and definitely made me feel comfortable and optimistic about the course.
